#include "server.h"

#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                   []() -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                   });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
    verify(sp_log_svr_);
    int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    ret = ret << 32;
    ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++;
    return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    /*
    Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format
    for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);   
    
    */
    mtx_.lock();
    uint64_t op_id = next_op_id++;
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
    uint64_t index, term;
    bool isLeader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
    if (!isLeader) {
        mtx_.unlock();
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // Wait for op to be applied
    op_responses[op_id] = "";  // when this contains a non-empty value, we received a response
    mtx_.unlock();
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    // Is there a result?
    if (op_responses[op_id] != "") {
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    } else {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid,
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    /* your code here */
    mtx_.lock();

    uint64_t op_id = next_op_id++;
    // Make Op object
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
    uint64_t index, term;
    bool isLeader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
    if (!isLeader) {
        mtx_.unlock();
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    // Wait for op to be applied
    op_responses[op_id] = "";  // when this contains a non-empty value, we received a response
    mtx_.unlock();
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    if (op_responses[op_id] != "") {
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    } else {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid,
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    /* your code here */
    mtx_.lock();
    uint64_t op_id = next_op_id++;
    // Make Op object
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

    RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();
    uint64_t index, term;
    bool isLeader = svr.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
    if (!isLeader) {
        mtx_.unlock();
        return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    // Wait for op to be applied
    op_responses[op_id] = "";  // when this contains a non-empty value, we received a response
    mtx_.unlock();
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    if (op_responses[op_id] != "") {
        *v = op_responses[op_id];
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    } else {
        return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
    mtx_.lock();
    RaftServer& svr = GetRaftServer();

    if (v->data_.size() < 4) {
        Log_info("Error: payload mismatch %d", v->data_.size());
        return;
    }

    string oid = v->data_[0];
    string op_id = v->data_[1];
    string op = v->data_[2];
    string key = v->data_[3];

    int64_t this_op_id = std::stoi(op_id);

    if (op == "put") {
        string value = v->data_[4];  // TODO: validate size here
        kv_store_[key] = value;
        op_responses[this_op_id] = "put";
    } else if (op == "append") {
        string value = v->data_[4];
        if (kv_store_.count(key) == 1) {
            // Key exists, append
            kv_store_[key] += value;
        } else {
            // Key doesn't exist, do "put"
            kv_store_[key] = value;
        }
        op_responses[this_op_id] = "append";
    } else if (op == "get") {
        op_responses[this_op_id] = kv_store_[key];
    } else {
        Log_info("Error: Unknown operation - %s", op);
        mtx_.unlock();
        return;
    }
    mtx_.unlock();
    return;
    /* your code here */
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
    /* don't change this function */
    auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
    verify(commo_ != nullptr);
    cli->commo_ = commo_;
    uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    id = id << 16;
    cli->cli_id_ = id + cli_cnt_++;
    return cli;
}

}  // namespace janus
